name: Portrait
intro: The no-code decentralized website builder for Web3
introduce: Portrait is a no-code decentralized website builder that allows users to create, browse, and interact with their Web3 presence. With Portrait, users can easily express themselves online and showcase their values, interests, and goals. Portrait puts the user in control of their Web3 identity, allowing them to own and manage their data and interactions in a decentralized and trustless manner.
